title: Diamond Pearl Haaram Set - The 'Chandrika' Collection
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS clarity
G color) and Freshwater Pearls. Center stone is a Ruby (estimated 3 carats) with excellent clarity.
features: This exquisite Haaram necklace showcases a floral design intricately embellished with dazzling diamonds. Delicate diamond-studded leaf motifs grace the neckline, leading to a central pendant with a vibrant ruby surrounded by further diamond detailing. Dainty pearl drops adorn both the necklace and the matching jhumka earrings. The earrings feature a traditional dome shape. The piece showcases exquisite handcraftsmanship, typical of Hyderabadi jewelry.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi or Ugadi
and grand celebrations. This is a statement piece perfect for the bride or any special occasion where you want to make a lasting impression.
description: This Diamond Pearl Haaram set is a testament to timeless elegance, blending traditional design with modern brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the high-quality diamonds provide unparalleled sparkle. The inclusion of lustrous freshwater pearls adds a touch of femininity and grace. This set is a heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
